title: Issues loading into game?
body:
Having a lot of difficulties loading into game. After champ select the client simply says "Game in progress" and that's all. I generally have to restart my client 2-3 times before I can even start loading in. By that time I'm generally late to the party with a significant disadvantage and my team flames me. Sometimes they remake altogether and that's a free loss for me. This happens about every other game. Any ideas?

Some have suggested driver issues, but I've tried updating them and it says I already have the best available software.

replies.body: That's gotta be rather frustrating, to say the least =\ . It almost sounds like your network is having a hard time switching your connection over from the client to the actual game, so I'd recommend first checking up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is still configured properly there.
